title: Rambles in Europe in 1839. With sketches of prominent surgeons, physicians, medical schools, hospitals, literary personages, scenery, etc
author: Gibson, William
snippet: —The section of " Chemistry and Mineralogy," under the direction of Professor T. Graham as president, Richard Phillips, Esq. and Professor Johnston as vice-presidents, and Drs. Golding Bird and Melson, as secretaries, the Canon Street School.—The section of " Geology and Physical Geography," with its officers, Presidents Buckland, G. B. Greenough, Leonard Horner, Charles Lyell, T.
